name: charlotte's universe
notes:
> **this pattern is available for free as a 12-week photo-tutorial crochet-along [here][1] on my blog**.
> 
> please note that the paid pdf is an **english written-only, us version** of the pattern.  it contains only a few photos that i have deemed essential for the execution of the blanket.  it also contains **round-by-round charts** by the talented masako kawahara.
> 
> **this pdf also includes:**
> * an appendix for the pink charlie colourway (with instructions for the three bonus rounds)
> *	a colouring-in template for the blanket to help you plan colour placement
> *	a colours per round template to help you record your colours per round if you are using more than three colours. 
> *	links to the video tutorial, the photo tutorials for each part, and the online community that has grown around charlotte 
> 
> as a further aid, you will also receive a **special stitches and techniques pdf** with photo tutorials for all the special stitches and techniques described in the written-only pdf.

charlotte's universe is a 12-week crochet-along that started on the 1st of august 2021.

it is a continuous square blanket with a lot of floral/lace detail.

**instructions**
the pattern is presented as a free 12-week photo tutorial, with charts by masako kawahara and videos by esther dijkstra.  after many requests, i have now also added a **paid** written-only pdf version of the pattern.

**materials**
we have created three official colourways, but you are, of course, welcome to use whatever hook/yarn combination you desire.  a colouring in template is provided to help you decide on colour placement.

two of the colourways (vintage and sunshine) use a 4mm hook and scheepjes softfun aquarel/denim.  the third colourway (pink charlie) uses a 3.5mm hook and scheepjes woolly whirl/whirlette.

yarn packs for those are available in my [wool warehouse shop][2].

**difficulty**
intermediate - *although this is an advanced pattern, it has been specifically written for adventurous beginners*

**size**
vintage and sunshine:  160cm (63")
pink charlie:  130cm(51")
